JobTitle: Senior Manager, Chief of Staff, DEI
JobFullDesc: Senior Manager, Chief of Staff, DEI The Chief of Staff (CoS) role performs a wide range of project or initiative leadership duties on behalf of senior leaders in the organization, as a "second-in-command" or operating leader. This role will operate as an extension of and leverage to the DEI leader and will have significant responsibilities in supporting the development and execution of the DEI strategy and vision. Organizes teams and integration of all appropriate channels and sub-channels involved in execution and delivery of projects/initiatives.
